name: Mastery Talisman: Precise Destruction: III
description: When you deal exactly 3 DMG: Generate 4 Omni Element, then switch the trigger condition of this effect. (Switches and cycles through conditions in this order: 1/2/3/4)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you deal exactly 3 DMG:</color> Generate 4 $[K411], then switch the trigger condition of this effect. (Switches and cycles through conditions in this order: 1/2/3/4)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you deal exactly 3 DMG:</color> Generate 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>, then switch the trigger condition of this effect. (Switches and cycles through conditions in this order: 1/2/3/4)
